Persons using a TDD may contact OKLAHOMARELAY at 1‐800‐722‐0353 and voice calls should be made to 1‐800‐522‐8506 to communicate viatelephone with hearing telephone users and vice versa.INTRODUCTION AND NOTICE TO THE PUBLICAt this Regular Meeting of the City Council, in accordance with and pursuant toapplicable Council Rules and Robert's Rules of Order, the Council will consider, discuss, andmay take action on, adopt, amend, reject, or defer action on any item listed on this Agenda.In accordance with the City Charter and state law, the Council may approve and adopt abudget and/or amendments to the budget, including adding, deleting, increasing, or decreasingany appropriations, expenditures, and amounts thereof.1.RECEIPT & FILING OF MINUTESa. No items this week.2.APPOINTMENTS & REAPPOINTMENTSa. Carlye Jimerson – Appointment to the Tulsa Performing Arts Center Trust replacing WendyDrummond; term expires June 30, 2025.
